CustomField.description: This field calculates passed working days since IT/Parcel is open. If closed, it shows the difference between IT/Parcel creation and closure date , otherwise it shows the difference between created date and the present day.
CustomField.formula: If( Not( ISBLANK( IT_Parcel_Finish_date__c )) , (5 * ( FLOOR( ( IT_Parcel_Finish_date__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( IT_Parcel_Finish_date__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) ) - (5 * ( FLOOR( (IT_Parcel_Start_date__c- DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD(IT_Parcel_Start_date__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) ), (5 * ( FLOOR( ( today() - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( today()- DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) ) - (5 * ( FLOOR( ( IT_Parcel_Start_date__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD(IT_Parcel_Start_date__c- DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) ))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Working days elapsed since IT/Parcel is created.
CustomField.label: IT Parcel Duration
